h2_title: Where to Find the Mother of Stones
content: There’s one last wave of two after this, for a total of six Palestones for the whole fight. Again, don’t hold back, and use your Transformation Spell to power down at least one of the enemies as quickly as possible so you aren’t overwhelmed. Don’t be afraid to back well off and heal to stay out of range of their projectiles.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mother_of_Stones.md', within the main section titled 'Mother of Stones', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Mother of Stones' and the sub-subsection 'Mother of Stones Boss Fight'.
The content is as follows:
There’s one last wave of two after this, for a total of six Palestones for the whole fight. Again, don’t hold back, and use your Transformation Spell to power down at least one of the enemies as quickly as possible so you aren’t overwhelmed. Don’t be afraid to back well off and heal to stay out of range of their projectiles.
